name: Oafdragon Magician
text:
[ Monster Effect ]
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Magician" Pendulum Monster or 1 "Odd-Eyes" monster in your Graveyard, except "Oafdragon Magician"; add it to your hand.
You can only use this effect of "Oafdragon Magician" once per turn.
pendulum_text:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
If you have a "Magician" card in your other Pendulum Zone: You can add 1 face-up "Magician" or "Odd-Eyes" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to your hand, except "Oafdragon Magician".
You can only use this effect of "Oafdragon Magician" once per turn.
